quote: I know for an absolute honest-to-goodness fact that life can kick you to pieces, break you into a thousand little shards, and that you can get up again and mend yourself. I promise.
quote_letters: I KNOW FOR AN ABSOLUTE HONEST-TO-GOODNESS FACT THAT LIFE CAN KICK YOU TO PIECES BREAK YOU INTO A THOUSAND LITTLE SHARDS AND THAT YOU CAN GET UP AGAIN AND MEND YOURSELF I PROMISE
